button_no_paragraph.content: Both the "No" button text and url fields need to have content in order for this button to display.

button_no_link.label: "No" button redirect url
button_no_link.info: Enter the full url (with https://) of a website outside of your store.

recipe.name: Recipe
recipe.paragraph: [Add metafields for each recipe section below](/admin/metafields/article/create) to display here. See theme documentation for detailed instructions.

list_marker_accent_color.label: Make numbers and bullets the accent color

referenced_products.name: Referenced products
referenced_products.paragraph: Add a metafield for a [custom list of products](/admin/metafields/article/create) to display here.

show_teaser.label: Show teaser text
show_teaser.info: The teaser text is the first 20 words of the excerpt or of the article content when there is no article excerpt.

background_video.name: Background video
background_video.paragraph: Background videos will autoplay, loop, and have no sound. If you'd like a video with sound, use a Video section instead. For more information, see the [theme documentation](https://support.coquelicot.io/article/79-background-video).

min_height_on.label: Set a video minimum height
min_height_on.info: When this box is checked, your video will never be shorter than the value set below, and it will crop on the sides as needed to retain this height.

coming_soon_badge.paragraph: Displays instead of the sold out badge when a product is out of stock and has a true/false metafield called "badges.coming-soon".

new_badge.paragraph: Displays when a product has a true/false metafield called "badges.new", is in stock, and is not on sale.

buttons.content: If transparent background is chosen, button styles will revert back to defaults for mobile when they are positioned below the banner.

banner_height.label: Banner height
banner_height.info: Percentage of the screen height that the banner should occupy.

text_box_position_mobile.label: Text box overlap size (mobile)
text_box_position_mobile.info: The text box will overlap the bottom of the banner by this amount.

blog.label: Blog
blog.info: Select a blog to display a link to its main page

background_color_scheme.label: Color underneath section
background_color_scheme.info: Use this to match the color of the section above or below this one.

background_color_scheme_top.label: Color underneath section (top)
background_color_scheme_top.info: Use this to match the color of the section above this one.

background_color_scheme_bottom.label: Color underneath section (bottom)
background_color_scheme_bottom.info: Use this to match the color of the section below this one.

button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.
button_label.label: Button label

cart_note.label: Cart note
cart_note.info: Allow customers to add a text note to their order.

cart_shipping_tax_note.label: Show shipping and tax note
cart_shipping_tax_note.info: Show a note that indicates shipping and taxes are calculated at checkout.

banner_color_background.label: Banner background
banner_color_background.info: This background will show when there is no image.

custom_image.label: Custom image
custom_image.banner_info_desktop: Use this image instead of the collection featured image. Recommended image size: 2500px wide, aspect ratio 16:9.
custom_image.banner_info_mobile: Use this image instead of the collection featured image. Recommended image size: 1000px wide, aspect ratio 16:9.
custom_image.collection_list_info: Use this image instead of the collection featured image. Recommended image size: 1000px wide, aspect ratio 16:9.
custom_image.header_info: Use this image instead of the collection featured image. Recommended image size: 1500px wide, aspect ratio 4:3.

settings.header_paragraph: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections.](/admin/collections).

collection_image.label: Image
collection_image.info: If a custom image or featured image is selected but not set, the first product image will be used instead.

custom_image.paragraph: For a custom image, [add a file metafield to collections](/admin/metafields/collection/create) titled "custom.collection_card_image".

show_view_all.label: Show a link to view all collections

accent_1.label: Accent 1
accent_1.info: Used as the default for buttons. It should stand out against the site background color.

accent_1_contrast.label: Accent 1 contrast
accent_1_contrast.info: Contrast colors should stand out against their associated accent color.

accent_2.label: Accent 2
accent_2.info: Used as the default for secondary buttons. It should be less dominant than the Accent 1 color.

default_background.label: Default background
default_background.info: Used as the site background color.

image_placeholder_background.label: Image placeholder background
image_placeholder_background.info: This color/gradient is used to fill in areas that should have an image when no image is present.

overlay_color.label: Overlay color
overlay_color.info: The color of the tint overlay that covers the page when a drawer or pop up is open.

complementary_products.name: Complementary products
complementary_products.paragraph: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

currency_codes.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

product_count.label: Number of products to show
product_count.info: If there is no limit, all products in the collection will be displayed.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

product_subtitle.name: Product subtitle
product_subtitle.label: Product subtitle
product_subtitle.info: [Add a product subtitle metafield](/admin/metafields/product/create) to display here.

first_section.label: First section on page
first_section.info: Checking this box will make images and animations in this section load immediately which is better for SEO and page speed performance.

font_color.label: Font color
font_color.info_contrast: Used as the text color for buttons. Should stand out against the font color.

heading.info: This heading will only show if there is no image.

show_shop_button.label: Show "Follow on Shop" button
show_shop_button.info: Allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront. Shop Pay must also be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

show_social.label: Show social icons at the bottom of this block

country_region_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)
country_region_selector.label: Show country/region selector

language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)
language_selector.label: Enable language selector

image.label: Image
image.info: Recommended image size: 800px wide x 533px tall

enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.
enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header

header_menu_font.label: Font style for menu links in header

logo_mobile.label: Logo image (mobile)
logo_mobile.info: Leave blank to use the same image as the desktop logo.

mega_menu_title_font.label: Font style for top level menu items

mega_menu_title_bold.label: Make top level menu items bold

menu_links_bold.label: Make menu links in header bold

transparent_header.label: Make header transparent on home page

transparent_logo.label: Logo for transparent header (desktop)
transparent_logo.info: Optional, will default to the "Logo image (desktop)" if empty

transparent_logo_mobile.label: Logo for transparent header (mobile)
transparent_logo_mobile.info: Optional, will default to the "Logo image (mobile)" or the logo used for the transparent header desktop if empty

image.name: Image
image.label: Image
image.info_size_full_screen_desktop: Recommended size: at least 2500px wide, aspect ratio 16:9.
image.info_size_full_screen_mobile: Recommended size: at least 1000px wide, aspect ratio 16:9.

image_overlap_bottom_edge.label: Make image extend over the bottom edge of the container

image_width.label: Width (desktop)
image_width.info: Image defaults to full width on mobile.

layout.label: Image placement (desktop)
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

details_tab.name: Details tab
details_tab.paragraph: All details tabs will display together underneath all other block types, no matter where they are manually ordered.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

show_quick_add.label: Show product quick add on page scroll

three_column_layout.label: Center media on large desktop screens

map.name: Map
map.paragraph: Before your first map section, visit the "Maps" section under "Theme Settings" to add site configurations for Google Maps.

map_style.label: Map style
map_style.info: This map style will be used throughout the theme wherever a map is displayed.

image.label: Backup image
image.info: Image will display in case the map does not load, or if there is no map address or Map API key.

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: You must have added a Google Maps Api Key to "Theme Settings" for a map to load.

show_directions.label: Show directions
show_directions.info: Include a link that opens directions to the above address in a new browser window.

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: Register a [Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display and customize a map.

paragraph.content: To customize, visit the "Mobile menu" section in "Theme Settings".

newsletter.name: Newsletter
newsletter.paragraph: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

newsletter_success_message.label: Sign up success message
newsletter_success_message.info: Customize the message that appears after a customer signs up for the newsletter.

enable_predictive_search.label: Enable product suggestions in the header search bar

buttons.label: Variant options for buttons
buttons.info: Choose which variant options will be displayed as buttons. For more than one option, separate with a comma. For example: Size, Flavor

product_card_show_swatches.label: Show swatches on product cards
product_card_show_swatches.info: Show first set of swatch options on product cards when available.

product_image_rounded_corners.label: Add rounded corners to product images

product_placeholder_image.label: Product placeholder image
product_placeholder_image.info: Upload an image that will be used on product cards for products that do not have any uploaded media. Recommended size: 2000px wide.

product_quick_add.label: Enable quick add button on product cards

swatches.label: Variant options for swatches
swatches.info: Choose which variant options will be displayed as swatches. For more than one option, separate with a comma. For example: Color, Style

products_per_page.label: Products per page
products_per_page.info: The number of products to display per page before paginating.

products_per_row.label: Maximum products per row (desktop)
products_per_row.info: This will decrease automatically as the screen width shrinks to a minimum of 2 across on mobile.

promo_popup.name: Promo pop up
promo_popup.content: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

campaign_name.label: Campaign name
campaign_name.info: Only change when you want the popup to show again to users who have previously opted out.

image_mobile.info: Will be cropped to a wide landscape ratio (2:1).

heading.info: Add a heading before a section of questions.

settings.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

results_per_page.label: Results per page
results_per_page.info: The number of results to display per page before paginating.

results_per_row.label: Maximum results per row (desktop)
results_per_row.info: This will decrease automatically as the screen width shrinks to a minimum of 2 across on mobile.

share.name: Share
share.paragraph_featured_image: If you include a link in social media posts, the pageâ€™s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)
share.paragraph_title_description: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)
share.paragraph_email_clipboard: Buttons to share over email and copy a link to clipboard will always be shown.

show_slider_desktop.label: Show within a slider on desktop

show_slider_mobile.label: Show within a slider on mobile

solid_text_box.name: Solid text box options
solid_text_box.paragraph: Styles apply for all text box color schemes except "transparent background".

text_box_overlap.label: Make text box overlap section above/below

text_box_position.label: Text box position
text_box_position.info_mobile: Box will be positioned bottom on mobile

transparent_text_box.name: Transparent text box options
transparent_text_box.paragraph: Styles apply only on desktop for "transparent background" text box color scheme.

overlay_on.label: Tinted overlay
overlay_on.info: Add a tinted overlay to the background image on desktop to help make text stand out.

body_font.label: Font
body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

heading_font.label: Font
heading_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

heading_font_size.label: Size
heading_font_size.info: The size of your largest heading. All other headings will scale down automatically from this size.

accent_font.label: Font
accent_font.info: This font will display throughout the theme in badges, breadcrumbs and subheadings and should be legible at a small size.

cover_image.label: Cover image
cover_image.info: This image will automatically crop to be the same size as the video.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

video_info.content: Embeded videos will display when there is no Shopify-hosted video uploaded.

video_url.label: Video URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

layout.label: Video placement (desktop)
layout.info: Video first is the default mobile layout.

video_overlap_bottom_edge.label: Make video extend over the bottom edge of the container

video_width.label: Width (desktop)
video_width.info: Video defaults to full width on mobile.
